room_description: This room has one double bed. It is one size narrower than the standard. There is no bathtub, only a shower. It is comfortable because you can reach it without moving around.
This room offers a choice of either a double bed or twin beds. There is a bathtub available for soaking in hot water.

This room offers a choice of either a double bed or twin beds. The room is larger than the deluxe type, so you can sleep comfortably.
It is a room with a single tatami mat with a low-type double bed that creates an open space. There is also a washing area in the bath, so you can relax like you are at home in Japan.

This room has one queen size bed. There is a large kitchen where you can easily prepare your own meals.
